sentences.en: " Outside are insignia, shown in state ; But here are sweet incense - clouds , quietly ours . "
sentences.cn: 兵卫森画戟, 宴 寝 凝清香.

sentences.en: Accessories will include cap badge , collar badge, rank insignia badge , service badgearm badge, ribbon, etc.
sentences.cn: 帽徽, 领徽, 等级勋章,姓名牌, 军种章, 臂章等.

sentences.en: All officers wear grade insignia on the left side of garrison caps.
sentences.cn: 所有的军官都在军便帽的左边戴上阶级徽章.

sentences.en: He desired not the purple and the fasces, the insignia of vulgar command.
sentences.cn: 他并不向往标志着庸俗权力的高官厚禄.

sentences.en: His mother pinned the insignia carefully on her son's chest.
sentences.cn: 母亲认真地将勋章别在儿子的胸前.

sentences.en: His uniform bore the insignia of a captain.
sentences.cn: 他的制服上有上尉徽章。

sentences.en: Naval officers have stripes on their sleeves as insignia of their rank.
sentences.cn: 海军军官在他们的袖子上有像他们身分标帜的条纹.

sentences.en: Of interest is the plate upon which the divisional insignia has been painted.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是涂有该师临时师徽的铁片.

sentences.en: Rags are insignia of the beggar's profession.
sentences.cn: 衣衫褴褛便是乞丐的标帜.

sentences.en: Soldiers were throwing down their arms and officers were cutting insignia of rank from their sleeves.
sentences.cn: 兵士们丢掉武器,军官们撕下袖章.

sentences.en: The insignia was visible on the wingtip.
sentences.cn: 翼梢上的徽记清晰可见.

sentences.en: The official insignia for the rank of Lord is a metal seal, or chop.
sentences.cn: 此侯王的官徽是一枚金属章或印.

sentences.en: There are five insignia on various parts of the plane.
sentences.cn: 在飞机的不同部分有五个徽记.

sentences.en: This article analyzed the judicial protection of Olympic insignia used the case study method.
sentences.cn: 运用案例分析研究方法,分析了奥林匹克标志的司法保护实践.

sentences.en: You must seal the document with the king's insignia.
sentences.cn: 你应该在带有国王印记的文件上盖章.

trans.tran_cn: 证章，官职的标志（如肩章、领章等）
trans.tran_en: a badge or sign that shows what official or military rank someone has, or which group or organization they belong to
